item.title: Manipulation of directories and files
item.description: Create dir if it does not exist import os path='/tmp/test' if not os.path.exists(path): os.mkdir(path) Do something if dir exists (alternative) import pathlib data_dir = pathlib.Path('data/') if not data_dir.exists(): print('do something') do something Change directory os.chdir(path) print(f'New location is: {os.getcwd()!r}') New location is: '/private/tmp/test' Create file in directory and list Options available: os.O_RDONLY, os.O_WRONLY, os.O_RDWR, os.O_CREAT, os.O_APPEND fd = os.open('mytext.txt', os.O_RDONLY | os.O_CREAT) # open file print(f'Intial file: {os.listdir(path)}') # list content of directory os.

item.title: Print statements
item.description: f-string formatting: f ' <text> { <expression> <optional !s, !r, or !a> <optional : format specifier> } <text> ... ' where <optional !s, !r, or !a> mean !s (str), !r (repr), and !a (ascii) import datetime name = 'Othmane' age = 30 anniversary = datetime.date(1989, 2, 6) print(f'My name is {name.lower()}, my age next year is {age+1}, my anniversary is {anniversary:%A, %B %d, %Y}.') print(f'He said his name is {name!r}.') # !
